message.content: Yes, the authors included the full text of instructions given to participants for both PARKING and WRITING tasks, as well as screenshots of the instructions and example interfaces for both tasks. They can be found in the appendix section under the sub-heading "User Study" and corresponding figures (Figures 11, 12, 13, and 14).

Yes, the authors included the full text of instructions given to participants for both the PARKING and WRITING tasks (Figures 13 and 14) and provided screenshots of the user interfaces for both tasks (Figures 11 and 12) in the appendix section of the paper.

Yes, the authors included the full text of instructions given to participants in Figures 13 and 14, and they also provided screenshots of the user study interfaces for both tasks in Figures 11 and 12. They provided additional details about the user study procedures and the post-task survey questions in their paper's Appendix section.
